#Installation.

= Installation =

The installation procedure download the required packages and checkout the source code of the simulator from the svn repository. The simulator is written in C++ and you need automake gcc and the boost library in your system.

To retrieve the installation script do

svn co https://ccnpl-sim.googlecode.com/svn/tags/ccnpl-sim-0.1.0

cd ccnpl-sim-0.1.0

sh install.sh
